summary: This document is a certification from the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands regarding the amendment of the Articles of Incorporation for a corporation originally named Financial Informatics, which changed its name to Southern Titus Company, Inc. The document confirms that the amendment was duly recorded and is in effect from the specified date.

persons.name: Y R. Francis
persons.context: Y R. Francis is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who certifies the amendment of the corporation's name.

events.title: Certification of Corporate Name Change
events.description: The Lieutenant Governor certifies the amendment of the Articles of Incorporation for Financial Informatics to Southern Titus Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The document certifies the name change of Financial Informatics to Southern Titus Company, Inc.
The amendment was filed on September 21, 2012.
The certification is signed by Y R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
